name: Color Way
description:
[This is a demo version for the Hits Playtime contest]

Color Way is a colorful puzzle game developed for any touchscreen device. Tiny squares are on your field, but they are of the wrong color. Be creative and mix them to make your way through.

Still in development, a full and improved version with more content will be released later on itch.io and Android! Stay reassure, the game will always be free and with no ads.

Be sure to check out our Facebook and Twitter pages for more informations.

If you encounter technical problems, bugs or if you have any suggestion that could improve the game, do not hesitate to contact us on social networks, or send us an email at colorwaygame@gmail.com.

Have fun!

____________

Known Issues:

• With Firefox, you won't be able to interact with the game for some reasons.

• With Internet Explorer, you'll experience graphics issues.
